metadata.title: CVE-2023-45913 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Mesa v23.0.4 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference via thefunction dri2GetGlxDrawableFromXDrawableId(). This vulnerability istriggered when the X11 server sends an DRI2_BufferSwapComplete eventunexpectedly when the application is using DRI3. NOTE: this is disputedbecause there is no scenario in which the vulnerability was demonstrated.

criterions.comment: mesa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
